nodes.bodyText: Move this to the actual Enum as a parse method (version independent). Have it support text and ordinal values, preferring text and falling back on ordinal.

Or store an integer value in the Enum as well if you'd like the order to be modifiable in the future. (Needs a lookup map built in that case)
Also a call to values() creates a new array each time.
Done, and good to know on the latter. I'm thinking that the enum list here won't likely change, so we are good on the lookup map.
